name: Search Console Advanced
description: Feature-rich Google Search Console server with 19 tools including URL inspection, sitemap management, batch operations, and period comparison. Community-built by AminForou.
author: AminForou

GSC_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRETS_FILE.description: Path to OAuth client secrets JSON (for user-level auth)

GSC_CREDENTIALS_PATH.description: Path to service account credentials JSON

GSC_SKIP_OAUTH.description: Set to 'true' to use service account instead of OAuth

tools.name: add_site
tools.description: Add a new site to Search Console

tools.name: delete_site
tools.description: Remove a site from Search Console

tools.name: get_search_analytics
tools.description: Search analytics with dimensions and date ranges

tools.name: get_advanced_search_analytics
tools.description: Advanced query with sorting, filtering, pagination

tools.name: compare_search_periods
tools.description: Compare analytics between two time periods

tools.name: get_search_by_page_query
tools.description: Queries driving traffic to specific pages

tools.name: inspect_url_enhanced
tools.description: Check indexing status and rich results for a URL

tools.name: get_sitemaps
tools.description: List all sitemaps for a property

tools.name: list_sitemaps_enhanced
tools.description: Detailed sitemap listing with submission dates

tools.name: get_sitemap_details
tools.description: Detailed info about a specific sitemap

tools.name: submit_sitemap
tools.description: Submit a new sitemap to Google

tools.name: delete_sitemap
tools.description: Remove a sitemap from Search Console
